subject: About brake springs
description_text:
Hey,

Im really close to ordering your Plus X 2-pedal set, Handbrake and additional stuff.

Im not sure if i wanna use the brake pedal with rubbers or with springs and i want to have everything available for testing so i get them just right for my liking.

If I order additional springs from your website, do you include different kind of spacer/spring guides for them so that they fit perfectly and the pressure comes evenly to springs?
Or are the spacers, which are included with the pedals enough and springs fit perfectly to brake rod without any additional spacers?
Also i worry that metal rod might get damaged without plastic spring guides?


Hope i hear from you soon.
Thank you.

LähetettyOutlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Keijo Vinni,  You don’t need to purchase additional springs by default. Our springs, limit shims, and three sets of differently colored dampers can be combined for various car models and uses. If the nine combinations are not sufficient, you can order extra springs later.
